The commander agent issues the "support movement in area" mission to the subordinate platoons, with the given movement enhanced area as parameter.
Other platoons are ordered to reinforce or follow.
If more movement forbidden areas are given than subordinate platoons, some of movement forbidden areas will not given as parameter to subordinate platoons.
If less movement forbidden areas are given than subordinate platoons, some subordinates platoons which can perform the "block off an area" mission will received reinforce or follow.
Each platoon is given only one movement forbidden area.
The movement forbidden area is randomly chosen by the commander agent).
The mission continues until another one is issued.
